pullrequest.title: save configuration to the default location on exit

content.raw:
I like the idea of checking for a delta between loaded and saved and throwing up a dialog if there is a delta. If we can do that, I'd prefer that than a save_on_exit feature. 

Is it possible to just keep the loaded xml around and string compare the one that will be written on exit? i.e. if it's easy to do the delta, great. If not, then we can consider a save_on_exit toggle that just overwrites regardless if there's a delta or not.
